text: aho nabivaraya ! ‘numbalage hadavat tula æti yam yahapatak gæna allah danne nam numbalagen ganu læbu dæta vada yahapat dæ numbalata ohu pirinamanu æta. tavada numbalata ohu sama va denu æta’ yæyi sirukaruvan aturin numbalage atadamguve pasuvannanhata numba pavasanu. tavada allah atiksamasiliya. asamasama karunanvitaya
